messages.body: $AAPL lol apple broke their own apple watches they can't even remotely control the music app https://9to5mac.com/2017/11/14/feature-request-iphone-music-control-remote-apple-watch/

links.title: Feature Request: Restore iPhone music control from Apple Watch with Remote
links.description: watchOS 4.1 brought iCloud Music Library and Apple Music streaming to Apple Watch, but the redesigned Music app on watchOS 4 killed a feature that it offered since launch. watchOS removed the ability to remotely control music playing on your iPhone from your Apple Watch in favor of focusing solely on music playable from the watch.
